verses.verse: Whoever <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the father <S%G1080><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> <S%G99999><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

By <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> his <S%G846><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> whatever <S%G3956><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the victory <S%G3529><s%> that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, even our <S%G2257><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> he that believes <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that came <S%G2064><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that bears witness <S%G3140><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> that bear record <S%G3140><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, the Father <S%G3962><s%>, the Word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> that bear witness <S%G3140><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3588><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> agree <S%G1526><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> we receive <S%G2983><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has testified <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>.

He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>: he that believes <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has made <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a liar <S%G5583><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> he believes <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the record <S%G3141><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G1519><s%>.

He that has <S%G2192><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>; and he that has <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

These things <S%G5023><s%> have I written <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> you may know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the confidence <S%G3954><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>, he hears <S%G191><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he hears <S%G191><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> the petitions <S%G155><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we desired <S%G154><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> which is not <S%G3361><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, he shall ask <S%G154><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he shall give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> for them that sin <S%G264><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>. There is <S%G2076><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>: I do <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he shall pray <S%G2065><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> it <S%G1565><s%>.
All <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

And we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> lies <S%G2749><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> wickedness <S%G4190><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.
Little sons <S%G5040><s%>, keep <S%G5442><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> from <S%G575><s%> idols <S%G1497><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
